Articles.Content:
"Failure" completed and added to gallery

Also, The first draft of the PfL Fanfic's Prologue has been completed

Do you call that a failure?

I mean, yesterday I made my kerbal EVA, he fell 2 meters and the whole universe exploded, I launched another rocket, Kerbin was back, but Kerbol was nowhere in sight. The stars were gone too!

Anyway, looks cool, love the alarm lighting.
*sees latest image* Daaaaaaaang. Very Kerbal!
In production: Map of VSA landings (based on Lonesentry's Kerbol system map), grand list of VSA vehicles and aircraft (not including naval craft or other Kerbin-based vehicles)

In production: Map of VSA landings (based on Lonesentry's Kerbol system map), grand list of VSA vehicles and aircraft (not including naval craft or other Kerbin-based vehicles)

Also character outlines and fleshing out the staffing requirements of the VSA, both flight and ground crews.

In production: Map of VSA landings (based on Lonesentry's Kerbol system map), grand list of VSA vehicles and aircraft (not including naval craft or other Kerbin-based vehicles)

Yes! Silbervogel!
LORE! Yes!
Okay then! Taking a break from actual paintings to flesh out the lore a bit! Everyone fine with that?

Yep.

10charactersisnotaverygoodideaunlessyouconsidertheimplicationsofremovingitandhavingspameverywhere

Okay then! Taking a break from actual paintings to flesh out the lore a bit! Everyone fine with that?
Let me know if you come up with anything of importance to my end of the production. You know where to find me...
Yes, I am ok with it
I think, friends, y'all be excited by the stuff Chobit and I've been brainstorming
Historical Timeline is now available in the shiny new Lore section of the site!

Is the lore on site set in stone? if not ppl could have little spin off storys of the other space progams out there ive already got down some lore on one of my meny little spin off ship ideas this one using real tech as aposed to the sf based tech:3

Historical Timeline is now available in the shiny new Lore section of the site!

I love the story so far!

What's the 0 time based on?

There's a Problem...

I've gotten access to this by pressing the closed thingies, but not the orange itself: http://chobit389.wix.com/laythe#!blank/cya6

PS: All hail the Vesperian Empire!

hi............................................................

grabs chobit and throws her(?) into a purse

and runs out the door

hi............................................................

grabs chobit and throws her(?) into a purse

and runs out the door

Ahh, so that's where you got her from.

This purse is just a cheap knockoff!!! D:< I DEMAND TO BE KIDNAPPED IN EITHER A MILITARY RUCKSACK OR THE FINEST GUCCI HANDBAG!!!!

So, whats people's opinion of the lore? Just Nazi-esqe enough to slip by the grump mods?

This purse is just a cheap knockoff!!! D:< I DEMAND TO BE KIDNAPPED IN EITHER A MILITARY RUCKSACK OR THE FINEST GUCCI HANDBAG!!!!

We cut you in half to save space

Only you would demand the kidnappers to kidnap you better...

The lore is very nice, its good to have some backstory. And it should be fine as long as you don't make explicit references.

Edit: I thought the purpose of kidnapping is to ransom the person? How could we do that if chobit's been sawn in half?
Easy. BAD TV!(Don't ask)
I have to ask. Bad TV?

Sawn in half? I'll be fine. (Old pic is relevant -removed- pic)

I'll wait for a mod or admin to read it, but it's nice that for once I might be able to dispel all the accusations of NSDAPness

I have an anwser but it my break severl codes of the geneva convention.

Screw the Geneva convention!

Edited May 27, 2013 by LeonG17

HEY! They didn't ignore it, the ultimatum was late! D:< Do NOT condemn their actions due to a technicality. Nor should you let me list all the times the UK ignored the convention too!

PfL is a place for rocketry and sexy green ladies, not discussion about WWII, take that to Off-topic and I'll gladly follow and stuff logic and historical fact down your throat
